channel.title: Sell IPhone on 0x000216

item.title: Get Cash For Your Used or Broken iPhone
item.description: Your old iPhone may be worse for wear, but don’t throw it away! It’s still valuable. Discarding it wastes money and harms the environment when you can easily sell it for cash. Surprisingly, companies will buy your used iPhone regardless of its condition. Naturally, better condition means more money, but even damaged phones have value, ranging from a few dollars to over $100! A functional iPhone 4S can fetch over $100, far more than you’d get tossing it in the garbage.
